sentence.Network_en: Occasionally a patient is so debilitated that he must be fed intravenously.
sentence.Network_cn: 偶尔会有病人过于虚弱，必须通过静脉注射进食。

sentence.Network_en: Premature babies have to be fed intravenously.
sentence.Network_cn: 早产婴儿必须靠静脉输入喂养。

sentence.Network_en: Calcitonin, when administered intravenously, turns out to be yet another flush promoting agent.
sentence.Network_cn: 静脉注入降血钙素的结果表明, 它是一个潮红促进剂.

entry.def: Intravenous foods or drugs are given to sick people through their veins, rather than their mouths.
